product_name: SealLine Kodiak Taper 35 Dry Bag with Purge Valve
long_description: Lightweight dry bag features a tapered, flattened shape and low-friction fabric for slipping in and out of your kayak's bow or stern compartments. Polyurethane-coated oxford nylon is waterproof and abrasion resistant; radio-frequency welded seams seal out water. Reinforced 3-roll closure with webbing strap and side-release buckle keeps water out. One-way purge valve at tip is flexible and flush so it won't snag and makes it easy to seal bag--no more unrolling and re-rolling.
short_description: Lightweight dry bag features a tapered, flattened shape and low-friction fabric for slipping in and out of your kayak's bow or stern compartments.
